name: Baldi's Basics Classic Redone
description:
Oh, hi! Welcome to Baldi's Basics Classic Redone! A mod where the good ol' classic game Is redone!

What does this game contain?

This game contains New content and never before seen styles! They originate from the Remastered version.

When will the updates stop?

The updates stop when V1.8 will release, I still got loads of fixes and new features to add into 1.8! Make sure to stay tuned for the next update!

Does this game have any lore?

I honestly don't know. Version 1.8 might answer that question, probably.
